thoughts.text: I found several sources for the PDF guide using the 'google' command. I will use the 'browse_website' command to download the PDF from the Michigan State University Extension website. I will then use the 'read_file' command to extract information about different trees in Michigan.
thoughts.reasoning: I found several sources for the PDF guide using the 'google' command. I will use the 'browse_website' command to download the PDF from the Michigan State University Extension website. I will then use the 'read_file' command to extract information about different trees in Michigan. This will help me create an informative and accurate article about Michigan trees.
thoughts.plan:
- Use 'browse_website' command to download the PDF from the Michigan State University Extension website
- Use 'read_file' command to extract information about different trees in Michigan
- Use the information extracted to write the article
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to cite my sources in the article.
thoughts.speak: I found several sources for the PDF guide using the 'google' command. I will use the 'browse_website' command to download the PDF from the Michigan State University Extension website.
